name: Portall
description: Portall provides an intuitive web interface for generating, tracking, and organizing ports and services across multiple hosts. Features include easy port management with 360+ pre-defined services, unique port number generation, robust tagging system, Docker integration with Portainer/Komodo support, port scanning, and import/export tools for Caddyfile and docker-compose configurations. Ships with light and dark themes, drag-and-drop organization, and mobile-responsive design.
author: need4swede

form_fields.label: Secret Key
form_fields.hint: Flask secret key for session security (use a long random string)

form_fields.label: Enable Docker Integration
form_fields.hint: Enable Docker integration features for querying ports from containers

form_fields.label: Host IP
form_fields.hint: IP address of your host (defaults to 127.0.0.1 if unset)
